This advanced electric pulse massager combines multiple therapy modes including stroke, manipulation, acupuncture, cupping, massage, and scraping, making it a versatile solution for muscle tension, joint stiffness, and body fatigue. Equipped with multiple electrode pads, it targets different areas of the body such as shoulders, back, waist, arms, and legs to improve blood circulation, ease muscle pain, and promote relaxation. The easy-to-use digital display allows you to adjust modes and intensity levels according to your comfort, making it suitable for people of all ages. Lightweight and portable, it is perfect for home use, office breaks, or even travel. Whether you are looking for stress relief, physiotherapy support, or everyday muscle relaxation, this multifunctional therapy massager is an excellent choice to keep your body energized and pain-free.

name: IKT KERATIN NUTRITION 75g
description:
Tame flyaways, smooth frizz, and perfect your edges with our professional-grade Hair Wax Stick. This easy-to-use styling product offers a strong, all-day hold without leaving your hair stiff, greasy, or flaky. Achieve a polished look, whether you're securing a sleek ponytail, smoothing a part, or creating detailed texture.



Key Features


Non-Greasy Formula: Provides a firm hold and a natural finish without weighing hair down.Frizz & Flyaway Control: Instantly smooths down stray hairs and baby hairs for a clean, sleek appearance.Deep Conditioning: Formulated with moisturizing ingredients to nourish your hair while styling.Easy Application: The solid stick format allows for precise and mess-free application directly to the hair.Long-Lasting Hold: Keeps your style intact throughout the day.Size: Each stick is 75g (2.7 fl. oz.).


Available Variants


We offer two distinct formulations designed for healthy, smooth styling:

Keratin Nutrition (I.K.T.): Formulated with Keratin for intensive nourishment and smoothing. Recommended for restoring vitality and managing texture, this variant is the key to sleek, healthy-looking hair. (Note: The image shows 98% for damaged hair.)Argan Oil & Protein (Lightness): Enriched with Argan Oil and Protein to provide deep moisturizing and brilliant shine. This stick is perfect for promoting hair health while locking in your style. (Note: The image shows 95% for damaged hair.)


How to Use


Apply the stick directly to the areas of the hair you want to control, smooth, or add texture to. For flyaways, gently smooth the stick over the surface of the hair. Use a comb or your fingers to refine the style.

Product Details:
Mix a small amount of the blue powder or blue tansy oil into a carrier oil like jojoba, argan, or sweet almond oil.Apply 2-3 drops to clean, damp skin. Gently massage in circular motions until absorbed.Combine the powder with a natural base like honey, yogurt, or clay.Add a few drops of water or rose water to form a smooth paste.Apply to the face, avoiding the eyes. Leave on for 10-15 minutes before rinsing with lukewarm water.Mix the powder with a little water or aloe vera gel to form a paste.Dab onto blemishes or irritated areas and leave it on overnight.Add a pinch of the powder to your moisturizer, serum, or toner for extra benefits.Always do a patch test to check for sensitivity before full application.Use springly, as the blue pigment is potent and may stain if overused.Store in a cool, dry place to preserve its effectiveness.Anti-Inflammatory: Calms redness, irritation, and inflammation, making it ideal for sensitive or acne-prone skin.Antioxidant-Rich: Protects the skin from environmental damage and free radicals.Hydrating: Helps retain moisture, leaving the skin soft and supple.Balancing: Regulates sebum production, reducing oiliness and breakouts.Healing: Speeds up the recovery of minor blemishes and wounds.
